name: Slider
description: Slider is an input component to provide a numerical input

orientation.label: orientation
orientation.title: Orientation of the slider, valid values are horizontal and vertical.

step.label: step
step.title: Step factor to increment/decrement the value.

range.label: range
range.title: When speficed, allows two boundary values to be picked.

disabled.label: disabled
disabled.title: When present, it specifies that the component should be disabled.

tabindex.label: tabindex
tabindex.title: Index of the element in tabbing order.

aria-labelledby.label: aria-labelledby
aria-labelledby.title: Establishes relationships between the component and label(s) where its value should be one or more element IDs.

aria-label.label: aria-label
aria-label.title: Used to define a string that labels the element.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: change
events.title: Callback to invoke on value change.

events.name: slideend
events.title: Callback to invoke when slide ends.
